metadata.chapter_title: The Keystone Principle and the Contractive Nature of Cloning

part_1_foundations.description: Mathematical foundations for coupled state space, Lyapunov function, and foundational axioms

part_2_keystone_lemma.description: Multi-chapter proof of the Keystone Lemma establishing error-to-signal conversion

part_3_drift_analysis.description: Application of Keystone Lemma to prove Foster-Lyapunov drift conditions

dependency_graph.description: Complete dependency graph showing all mathematical object relationships

key_dependency_chains.name: Keystone Causal Chain
key_dependency_chains.description: V_Var,x → Geometric structure → Fitness signal → Corrective targeting → Keystone bound

key_dependency_chains.name: Variance Contraction Chain
key_dependency_chains.description: Keystone → Alive walker contraction → Complete variance drift

key_dependency_chains.name: Boundary Safety Chain
key_dependency_chains.description: Safe Harbor axiom → Boundary fitness gradient → Potential contraction

key_dependency_chains.name: Complete Drift Chain
key_dependency_chains.description: Component drifts → Complete cloning drift → Synergistic condition

ax:domain-regularity.enables: Construction of smooth barrier function for boundary analysis

ax:lipschitz-fields.enables: Bounded velocity perturbations from environmental fields

ax:non-deceptive-landscape.enables: Reward signal correctly identifies high-error walkers

ax:velocity-regularization.enables: Control of kinetic energy through reward function

n_uniformity_constants.description: All contraction rates and bounds are independent of swarm size N

chi_epsilon.name: Feedback coefficient
chi_epsilon.description: Proportional response of cloning to variance error

g_max_epsilon.name: Offset constant
g_max_epsilon.description: Additive bound on error-weighted cloning activity
